text: Piṉṉar nam aṭiyārkaḷil nām evarkaḷait tērnteṭuttōmō, avarkaḷai avvētattiṟku vāricākkiṉōm; āṉāl avarkaḷiliruntu tamakkut tāmē aniyāyam ceytu koṇṭavarkaḷum uṇṭu, avarkaḷiliruntu naṭunilaiyā naṭantu koṇṭavarkaḷum uṇṭu, iṉṉum avarkaḷiliruntu, allāhvi; ṉa aṉumati koṇṭu naṉmaikaḷ ceyvatil muntik koṇṭavarkaḷum uṇṭu. Ituvē māperum pākkiyamākum
